modName: Ancient Staff - Bane of the Undead
summary: New Staff with a New Enchantment, Staggers normal Foes but Unliving Fire burns the Undead.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a Staff to the Game which uses Dawnbreaker\'s enchantment (minus the Fear) and a general stagger, the Dawnbreaker enchantment only effects undead while the stagger effects all foes. Simultaneously Applies 30 seconds of Dragonhide to you (Master Alteration, reduced physical damage by 80%)

PLEASE SEE VIDEO

Intended for Higher level Players, 30+ doing high damage to Undead. 

Installation: Extract the Data folder into Skyrim Directory. 

Aquisition: search help ancient, page up and it should be there.. player.aditem 18000d66 1


Recommended Mods:  

Staves of Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22691 I used one of their textures for this. Mine will work perfectly without this mod but its a great addition to the game.
author: Cuzimazz
